term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary: This bill requires the Food and Drug Administration to issue guidance that addresses using alternative statistical methods, including adaptive trial design and Bayesian methods, in clinical trials and in the development and review of drugs and biological products.
